about_the_game:
This is a novel VR casual game that allows players to enjoy endless fun in the battle between cats and dogs.



In the game, the player will randomly choose the team to become a member of the cat team or dog team, and manipulates one of the animals to fight. Players need to cooperate with their teammates to fight and operate their animals to defeat the opponent's team. When the animal operated by the player is killed, the perspective will automatically switch to the perspective of a random teammate, allowing the player to experience different battle perspectives and strategies. There are 7 kinds of dogs and 10 kinds of cats in the game. At the beginning of the game, 5 kinds of battles are randomly selected to bring infinite possibilities and stimuli to each game. When one party was killed, the other party won, and the game ended.
With its unique gameplay and exquisite screen, the game brings players a new virtual reality game experience. This game allows players to feel the importance of teamwork and strategy, and at the same time enjoy the fun of operating different animals. Come and join this fierce cat and dog war!

Operation method:

Move: Left/right handle up/downward/downward
Turn: Left/right handle
Attack: Left/right handle trigger button
Reservation: Left/right handle grip key
